stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used as a replacement for  /* missing loop header */  so that the code segment produces the output  00_01_02_11_12_22_?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment.

 

for (int outer = 0; outer < 3; outer++) 
{
   for ( /* missing loop header */ ) 
   {
      System.out.print(outer + "" + inner + "_");
   }
}
